entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 this morning except gusting to 60 near the water. Wind becoming light late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
